item.description:
The Original Steppers of Boston invite you to come out and mix and mingle after your family cook out

The bar will not be open

 

STEPTACULAR Summer Step Off, After Cook Out Set 6 TO 10 P.M. Monday May 30,2011

Featuring DJ Bright Eyes With The Best Steppin Tunes

TOSOB Have New STEPS to Take On The Dance Floor

STEPPIN IN CAPRI , SHORTS AND HEELS

All Family, friends welcome

April Steppin Birthday Dance

Dorris Dean
Greg Dean
April Holley
Mary Johnson

May Steppin Birthday Dance

Barbara
Scott
Theresa
Eleanore

Circle Time

 

Cash bar...Good Food.... A GREAT TIME

 

NEW TO STEPPIN?

ADVANCE BEGINNER?

WELCOME, AND PLEASE JOIN US ON THURSDAY AT THE CARVER DEN FOR LESSONS PROVIDED BY THE CERTIFIED STEPPING INSTRUCTORS SCOTT, TRACEY AND AUDREY (CSI'S")
